text: Lee Woo-Jin (; born 25 April 1986) is a South Korean football player who plays as a centre back for Jeju United. He used to play for teams like Suwon Bluewings, Busan I'Park, and Japanese clubs Tokyo Verdy and Júbilo Iwata. On 3 June 2009, he played his first game for the South Korea national team against Oman after coming on as a substitute at the 59th minute. But this game was not officially recorded. On 18 November 2009, he moved to a Japanese club called Júbilo Iwata with a three-year contract. == Statistics == Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals South Korea South Korea South Korea League League KFA Cup KFA Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2002 Suwon Bluewings K-League 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2003 1 0 0 0 - 1 0 Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2004 Tokyo Verdy J1 League 7 0 4 1 2 0 13 1 2005 17 1 0 0 2 0 19 1 South Korea South Korea South Korea League League KFA Cup KFA Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2006 Busan I'Park K-League 12 0 1 0 8 0 21 0 2007 6 0 0 0 0 0 6 0 2008 17 0 0 0 4 0 21 0 2009 24 1 2 0 8 1 34 2 Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2010 Júbilo Iwata J1 League 28 0 0 0 6 1 34 1 2011 4 0 1 0 6 0 11 0 South Korea South Korea South Korea League League KFA Cup KFA Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2012 Jeonbuk Hyundai K-League Total South Korea South Korea 59 1 3 0 20 1 82 2 Total Japan Japan 56 1 5 1 16 1 77 3 Career total Career total Career total 115 2 8 1 36 2 159 5 Korea Republic national team Korea Republic national team Korea Republic national team Year Apps Goals 2009 1 0 Total 1 0 ==Honors== ===Club=== ;Tokyo Verdy Emperor's Cup: 2004 ==References== ==Other websites== * * National Team Player Record * * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean footballers Category:Tokyo Verdy players Category:Júbilo Iwata players Category:FC Machida Zelvia players Category:J1 League players Category:J2 League players
